title: MySpeed LXC
textContent:
MySpeed LXC 
                MySpeed is a speed test
                    analysis software that records your internet speed for up to 30 days.
                To create a new Proxmox VE MySpeed LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                    To Update MySpeed, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/myspeed.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                MySpeed Interface: IP:5216
outerHTML:
MySpeed LXC

MySpeed is a speed test analysis software that records your internet speed for up to 30 days.

To create a new Proxmox VE MySpeed LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update MySpeed, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/myspeed.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

MySpeed Interface: IP:5216
